html.p: The library is straightforward to use. To set up, you need to do two things:

ul.li: Upload python_lib.zip as a static asset (Warning: if you are already using a custom python grading library, then you will need to combine the two!)

html.p: To use in a problem, create an advanced problem, and enter the following to see if things are working:

problem.script: from mitxgraders import * grader = StringGrader( answers='cat' )

html.p: Very similar to the Studio usage above. To set up:
